<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A address must be loaded from a small section if its size is less than the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// small section size threshold. Data in this section must be addressed using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gp&#95;rel operator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="#a44410975d8733e20074cb9a87e896995"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a44410975d8733e20074cb9a87e896995">IsInSmallSection</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gcc has traditionally not treated zero-sized objects as small data, so this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is effectively part of the ABI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/lanai/lanaitargetobjectfile-cpp/#a335b4897afc4c677c5a4f956544933c1">SSThreshold</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if this global address should be placed into small data/bss</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipstargetobjectfile/#aa748aed9bae156d6952b2695928bafc4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MipsTargetObjectFile::IsGlobalInSmallSection(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We first check the case where global is a declaration, because finding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// section kind using getKindForGlobal() is only allowed for global</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definitions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a32e606ac4c88f71f14212e42b808e7f4">isDeclaration</a>() || GO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#ae76e0b39c563b63554b4c99a8ad726e4">hasAvailableExternallyLinkage</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsGlobalInSmallSectionImpl(GO, TM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsGlobalInSmallSection(GO, TM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfile/#a2d7d72e2fddb81783b50ad05b746bc19">getKindForGlobal</a>(GO, TM));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if this global address should be placed into small data/bss</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MipsTargetObjectFile::</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">IsGlobalInSmallSection(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> Kind)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsGlobalInSmallSectionImpl(GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfile/#a4ef15b6d500629e31fb3787b7a0d7bb0">TM</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">         (Kind.isData() || Kind.isBSS() || Kind.isCommon() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">          Kind.isReadOnly());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if this global address should be placed into small data/bss</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// section. This method does all the work, except for checking the section</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// kind.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MipsTargetObjectFile::</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">IsGlobalInSmallSectionImpl(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipssubtarget">MipsSubtarget</a> &amp;Subtarget =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipstargetmachine">MipsTargetMachine</a> &amp;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfile/#a4ef15b6d500629e31fb3787b7a0d7bb0">TM</a>).getSubtargetImpl();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return if small section is not available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipssubtarget/#ac39000d549551360d4a1f23659162878">useSmallSection</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only global variables, not functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GVA = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(GO);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!GVA)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the variable has an explicit section, it is placed in that section but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it&#39;s addressing mode may change.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#ade7dc7510e950cd1c1181138b390f965">hasSection</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Section = GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a0b2e3fb45c4435c29abebf7768a77cd6">getSection</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Explicitly placing any variable in the small data section overrides</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the global -G value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Section == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sdata&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || Section == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sbss&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise reject accessing it through the gp pointer. There are some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// historic cases which GCC doesn&#39;t appear to respect any more. These</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are .lit4, .lit8 and .srdata. For the moment reject these as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enforce -mlocal-sdata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#a2a3bbafc6718725098f97113342d323e">LocalSData</a> &amp;&amp; GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a3ba1af4b9d9faa4a33729bbbecee83d1">hasLocalLinkage</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enforce -mextern-sdata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#a10bde38e0a7e6a2c74143e50930fa502">ExternSData</a> &amp;&amp; ((GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a1847e956a0087fefdb49e2a9583c7d18">hasExternalLinkage</a>() &amp;&amp; GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a32e606ac4c88f71f14212e42b808e7f4">isDeclaration</a>()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enforce -membedded-data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad56d6f4d95b41c67a7b0479ea88fa5da">EmbeddedData</a> &amp;&amp; GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#aa859e108741fa64681b63f0c0c672512">isConstant</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is possible that the type of the global is unsized, i.e. a declaration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if this constant should be placed into small data section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipstargetobjectfile/#a17e402cfbb88d7edf4cfcc1027d30e70"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipstargetobjectfile/#a17e402cfbb88d7edf4cfcc1027d30e70">MipsTargetObjectFile::getSectionForConstant</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
